title: New skins: Lancer Paragon and Rogue Blitzcrank

replies.body: my mate got them both for 1820 rp?
Why isn't this in the client Store yet? Its been a month since patch released.
I got the shard for lancer blitz. Saw its spotlight. The skin itself looks EPIC while hovering and all that, then when I saw it WALK, I lost my shit and disenchanted the skin straight away.
Ah chromas are costing as much as skins now, wonderful
These are different, if similar skins. they have different models and animations
Lol they didnt even care about changing the background. The skin cost 1350 (riot seems to set higher prices everytime) and both skins are pretty much the same with different colors. lol

Hhahahah look at the splash art, they didnt even bother changing the background, both are exactly the same. Riot is getting lazy with skins and making 2 same skins just changing the colors to make more money. savage
FIX THE BUG FAM. I'VE BEEN WAITING 3 WEEKS FOR THESE BABIES
WHERE ARE THE SKINS OMG, I AM WAITING SINCE DAY 1 SO EXCITED...{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Hey, Riot I saw the skins in store and wanted to buy it, but the skins were gone when I went to eb games to buy a gift card. wtf happen.
Have a good weekend Riot OCE, but where are the skins?

"Network Operations – 2:32 PM
Individual Lancer Blitzcrank skins have been temporarily removed from the store while we investigate a bug related to refunds."

WTF!!!! RIOT WHY ARE THE SKINS NOT IN STORE THEY SAY THEY WILL BE RELEASED IN PATCH 7.22 BUT THAT PAST!!!WTF RIOT CANT YOU FIX A FREAKING BUG I BEEN WAITING, FOR NOW, A MONTH!! I SEE PEOPLE GOT FROM CHEST AND IM PISSED!! RELEASE IT FOR FUCK SAKE

I know right? both splash arts backgrounds are exactly the same, riot is just making sma products with different colors and calling them skins, and 1350 per skin now? just a money making machine now. sad :(
LOL NEVER KNEW THESE SKINS EXISTED TILL I GOT THEM FROM HEXTECH CHEST XD
